verses.roman:
vasāilā tāre prabhu ādara kariyā
digvijayī kahe mane avajñā kariyā

synonyms: vasāilā—made seated; tāre—him; prabhu—the Lord; ādara—adoration; kariyā—offering him; dig-vijayī—Keśava Kāśmīrī; kahe—says; mane—within his mind; avajñā—disregard; kariyā—doing.
translation: The Lord received him with adoration, but because Keśava Kāśmīrī was very proud, he talked to the Lord very inconsiderately.
